body.p: An entity may present the summarised financial information required by paragraphs B12 and B13 on the basis of the joint venture's or associate's financial statements if:

li.p: the entity measures its interest in the joint venture or associate at fair value in accordance with IAS 28 (as amended in 2011); and
the joint venture or associate does not prepare IFRS financial statements and preparation on that basis would be impracticable or cause undue cost.

body.p: In that case, the entity shall disclose the basis on which the summarised financial information has been prepared.
